name: Gift of Sleep
description:
Controls:

  • WASD / Arrows to move
  • X to undo
  • R to restart level
  • M to go back to the menu screen

This game was meant for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019 (Dec 13 - Dec 15), I failed to meet the deadline but here is what I intended to make for that jam.

5 Puzzle levels in total.

The Jams theme was GIVING!

Recommend Full-Screen.
